page.title: 12Village Occupations
page.content: Most of our parents or people who we know work in Lincoln,Newark or Sleaford.The only occupations for people in small villages are in shops,postoffices,the building trade or Nocton Farms.There are 8,000 acres and over 60 people who work for Nocton Farms.We found out that 11 fathers out of 50 work in Lincoln.The figure for fathers who work out of Lincoln is 27 out of 50.There are only 3 fathers who work for Nocton Farms.The vast majority of mothers work in the home, one works in a town, none in Lincoln and two in local villages.
